items.title: Madonna urges Pope to visit Gaza 'before it's too late'
items.description: The US pop star says the pontiff is "the only one of us who cannot be denied entry".

items.title: Israel bombards Gaza City as UK and allies demand action against 'unfolding famine'
items.description: The countries demanded "immediate, permanent and concrete steps" to facilitate the entry of aid to Gaza.

items.title: British soldiers using sex workers in Kenya despite ban, inquiry finds
items.description: Chief of Defence Staff Sir Roly Walker says the army is committed to stopping sexual exploitation.

items.title: US and China extend trade truce to avoid tariffs hike
items.description: The US will hold its levy on Chinese imports at 30%, while China will keep a 10% tariff on American goods.

items.title: Dozens killed in attack on Sudan camp for people who had fled war
items.description: An aid group in Abu Shouk camp says at least 40 were killed by gunmen from the Rapid Support Forces.
